attributes.action: Give a knighthood to Kevin Sinfield.
attributes.additional_details:
Kevin Sinfield has raised millions of pounds for charity which predominantly has been for MND.
This is because he is an amazing and loyal friend to Rob Burrow who unfortunately suffers from this horrendous illness.
attributes.background: In recognition of his amazing fund raising efforts for MND.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
